LIGHTING: Dramatic key light emphasizing facial features
BACKGROUNDS: Solid black or dark grey studio backdrop
Simple, out-of-focus background to emphasize the subject
OBJECTS: Cat ears (headband or integrated into a tiara)
POSES: Posing to highlight makeup and accessories
CAMERA_ANGLES: Medium close-up on face and shoulders
Slightly low angle to convey confidence
ATMOSPHERES: A mix of danger and beauty
ACCESSORIES: Elaborate black lace or metal headpieces/veils
Septum ring and other facial piercings
Dramatic dark makeup (heavy eyeliner, black lipstick)

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Low; the aesthetic is dark, gothic, and stylized. It focuses on beauty, power, and mystery rather than inducing fear. There are no elements of gore, violence, or traditional horror.
